Package statistics

Class StatCollector

  • java.lang.Object
    • statistics.StatCollector
  • public class StatCollector
extends java.lang.Object
    This class provides useful methods for collecting one dimensional data (of type double) and for computing basic statistics.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      StatCollector()
      Creates a new collector and initializes it

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void add​(double x)
      Adds a new observation to this collector.
      double get95ConfidenceIntervalHalfWidth()
      Computes a confidence interval with a confidence level of 95% for the mean of the collected observations and returns half of the interval width.
      double getAverage()
      Returns the average of the collected observations since its last initialization.
      long getNumberOfObs()
      Returns the number of observations added to this collector since its last initialization.
      double getStandardDeviation()
      Returns the sample standard deviation of the collected observations since its last initialization.
      double getVariance()
      Returns the sample variance of the collected observations since its last initialization.
      void init()
      Initializes the collector

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • StatCollector

        public StatCollector()
        Creates a new collector and initializes it

    • Method Detail

      • init

        public void init()
        Initializes the collector

      • add

        public void add​(double x)
        Adds a new observation to this collector.
        Parameters:
        x - observation to be added to this collector

      • getNumberOfObs

        public long getNumberOfObs()
        Returns the number of observations added to this collector since its last initialization.
        Returns:
        the number of added observations since last initialization

      • getAverage

        public double getAverage()
        Returns the average of the collected observations since its last initialization.

        If no observations were added since last initialization, Double.NaN is returned.

        Returns:
        the average value of the collected observations

      • getVariance

        public double getVariance()
        Returns the sample variance of the collected observations since its last initialization.

        If this collection contains less than two observations, Double.NaN is returned.

        Returns:
        the sample variance of the collected observations

      • getStandardDeviation

        public double getStandardDeviation()
        Returns the sample standard deviation of the collected observations since its last initialization.

        If this collection contains less than two observations, Double.NaN is returned.

        Returns:
        the sample standard deviation of the collected observations

      • get95ConfidenceIntervalHalfWidth

        public double get95ConfidenceIntervalHalfWidth()
        Computes a confidence interval with a confidence level of 95% for the mean of the collected observations and returns half of the interval width.

        If this collection contains less than two observations, Double.NaN is returned.

        Returns:
        the sample standard deviation of the collected observations
